item.title: Microsoft fixes Windows upgrades failing with 0x8007007F error
item.dc:creator: Sergiu Gatlan
item.description: Microsoft has resolved a known issue that caused Windows upgrades to fail with 0x8007007F errors on some Windows 11 and Windows Server systems. [...]

item.title: Microsoft releases emergency updates to fix Windows recovery
item.dc:creator: Sergiu Gatlan
item.description: Microsoft has released emergency Windows out-of-band updates to resolve a known issue breaking reset and recovery operations after installing the August 2025 Windows security updates. [...]

item.title: PyPI now blocks domain resurrection attacks used for hijacking accounts
item.dc:creator: Bill Toulas
item.description: The Python Package Index (PyPI) has introduced new protections against domain resurrection attacks that enable hijacking accounts through password resets. [...]

item.title: Okta open-sources catalog of Auth0 rules for threat detection
item.dc:creator: Bill Toulas
item.description: Okta has open-sourced ready-made Sigma-based queries for Auth0 customers to detect account takeovers, misconfigurations, and suspicious behavior in event logs. [...]

item.title: Microsoft shares workaround for Teams "couldn't connect" error
item.dc:creator: Sergiu Gatlan
item.description: Microsoft is resolving a known issue that causes "couldn't connect" errors when launching the Microsoft Teams desktop and web applications. [...]

item.title: Elastic rejects claims of a zero-day RCE flaw in Defend EDR
item.dc:creator: Bill Toulas
item.description: Enterprise search and security company Elastic is rejecting reports of a zero-day vulnerability impacting its Defend endpoint detection and response (EDR) product. [...]

item.title: OpenAI releases $4 ChatGPT plan, but it's not available in the US for now
item.dc:creator: Mayank Parmar
item.description: OpenAI has finally announced the GPT Go subscription, which costs just $4 in the US or INR 399 in India. [...]

item.title: Pharma firm Inotiv says ransomware attack impacted operations
item.dc:creator: Bill Toulas
item.description: American pharmaceutical company Inotiv has disclosed that some of its systems and data have been encrypted in a ransomware attack, impacting the company's business operations. [...]

item.title: Microsoft: August security updates break Windows recovery, reset
item.dc:creator: Sergiu Gatlan
item.description: Microsoft has confirmed that the August 2025 Windows security updates are breaking reset and recovery operations on systems running Windows 10 and older versions of Windows 11. [...]

item.title: NY Business Council discloses data breach affecting 47,000 people
item.dc:creator: Sergiu Gatlan
item.description: The Business Council of New York State (BCNYS) has revealed that attackers who breached its network in February stole the personal, financial, and health information of over 47,000 individuals. [...]

item.title: Massive Allianz Life data breach impacts 1.1 million people
item.dc:creator: Sergiu Gatlan
item.description: Hackers have stolen the personal information of 1.1 million individuals in a Salesforce data theft attack, which impacted U.S. insurance giant Allianz Life in July. [...]

item.title: XenoRAT malware campaign hits multiple embassies in South Korea
item.dc:creator: Bill Toulas
item.description: A state-sponsored espionage campaign is targeting foreign embassies in South Korea to deploy XenoRAT malware from malicious GitHub repositories. [...]

item.title: Nebraska man gets 1 year in prison for $3.5M cryptojacking scheme
item.dc:creator: Sergiu Gatlan
item.description: A Nebraska man was sentenced to one year in prison for defrauding cloud computing providers of over $3.5 million to mine cryptocurrency worth nearly $1 million. [...]
